short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A consistent reminder to stand up throughout the day to encourage an active and healthy lifestyle.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever get caught up working on a solution to something at work, check the clock, and realize you've been sitting for 4 hours straight? Then the neck, shoulder, back tightness and pain hits you shortly afterwards? Then this extension is for you. Being reminded throughout the day to switch it up with a pleasant notification makes a world of difference in how you feel at the end of a long day at your desk.
